net.powermatcher.api.data

Class ArrayBid.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.powermatcher.api.data.ArrayBid.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ArrayBid

    public static final class ArrayBid.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder class to create an ArrayBid instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArrayBid.Builder(MarketBasis marketBasis)
      Constructor to create an instance of this class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayBid build()
      Makes sure the whole array is filled, then creates the ArrayBid with the Builder's internal values.
      ArrayBid.Builder demand(double demand)
      Adds a demand double to builderDemand.
      ArrayBid.Builder demandArray(double... demand)
      Sets the demandArray with the supplied demand array.
      ArrayBid.Builder fillTo(int priceStep)
      fills the demand array from the nextIndex until the designated priceStep with the last set demand Will do nothing on an already filled array.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArrayBid.Builder

        public ArrayBid.Builder(MarketBasis marketBasis)
        Constructor to create an instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        marketBasis - the MarketBasis of the cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • demand

        public ArrayBid.Builder demand(double demand)
        Adds a demand double to builderDemand.
        Parameters:
        demand - The demand to be added to the demand array. Must not be higher than the previous added demand.
        Returns:
        this instance of the Builder, with the added demand
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the demand to be added is higher than the demand already in the array
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when the demand array is already full

      • demandArray

        public ArrayBid.Builder demandArray(double... demand)
        Sets the demandArray with the supplied demand array. The supplied array must not be ascending. The length of the array should be the same size as the number of price steps in the marketBasis.
        Parameters:
        demand - The new demand array
        Returns:
        this instance of the Builder, with the added array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the size of the array differs from the number of priceSteps in the MarketBasis or if the demand array is ascending

      • build

        public ArrayBid build()
        Makes sure the whole array is filled, then creates the ArrayBid with the Builder's internal values.
        Returns:
        The created ArrayBid
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the length of the demandArray is not equal to the number of price steps

      • fillTo

        public ArrayBid.Builder fillTo(int priceStep)
        fills the demand array from the nextIndex until the designated priceStep with the last set demand Will do nothing on an already filled array.
        Parameters:
        priceStep - The priceStep to fill to.
        Returns:
        this instance of the Builder, with the filled demand array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when nextIndex is zero (no demand has been set, yet)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the supplied priceStep is higher than the number of price steps in the marketBasis
